column5: One more day Dan!  We're all pulling for you!
right on man

After you take first prize   (since today is going to be rough out there and likely not many will venture out - including me), would you mind telling your fellow OFNers details on the catch (depth of water, depth of lure, etc..).  If not, I understand but I am hoping to catch you in an extremely happy state of mind   - after all a Brand NEW $30,000 Lund/Trailer package doesn't come along every day.  This year has been pretty good for my dad, 5 year old son and I with many 20-25# fish caught but we just can't seem to zero in on anything much bigger.  Anyway, good luck and I am rooting for you.
oh i so hope it holds up and you win that boat!!!!!  cheers!

In case some of you dont recognize his name our very own Percher holds first place for this week in the Salmon Derby Sorry man I couldnt resist  Cross all fingers and toes this holds until Friday Night  CONGRATULATIONS DAN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
WOW!!! Awesome Percher!!! I'l keep my fingers crossed for you...maybe a nice cold front will swoop down and turn the bite off.  Good luck!

Wooooohoooo, that's fantastic.  Congratulations Percher.  I sure hope you win it this week bud  I'll be hoping for you the rest of the week.  Peter, is this published somewhere online, or just the Toronto Sun?  Joey
http://www.sportshows.ca/SalmonDerby/  Here you go JOEY
Great going and congratulations to Percher Dan!!!  Couldn't happen to a finer feller!!!
Hope you win Percher!
Hey Dan...can I have your boat if you win that sweet Lund??? LOL.

Good luck! I've heard you out on the lake looking for Slowpoke, I had thought I had seen his boat out there one day and called him on the radio the same day. Did you hear me, or was he really out there? In any event Good Luck!!! hope you win, i'm going to win next week
congrats dan!!!  but still comming after that spot!!!

Congrads thats a dandy,34+ can't see why it won't hold seeing as the leader for the 43 thousand $ truck is 35 and change,guess we will know buy 8pm friday night,my good luck wishes are with you... they are a nice boat thats for sure and i know first hand cause i won week six last year with a 29.74lber....  good luck............  Hawg Hunter
Congrats....here is crossing my fingers for you!
Congrats Dan, I wish you the best of luck. Thanks for the heads up Peter.
Thanks guys and girls.I hope it holds.Cross my fingers and toes . Dan
Congrats  for sure ... but .. am I the only one thinking ... PIC's !
Congrats on the catch and I hope you win as well. He's a good man! HH
Go percher go!
Way to go...Here's hoping it holds out for you...Good luck to you
I was out there on Sunday reeling in the monsters but I was not in my boat.    Dan, congrats bud! I think you might have to re-think your stance on consoles, that's a heckuva fish. -Brian
The lure is the one with the red on it, right?  JF
Congrats Percher hope you stay on top  Rob
Nice Hog. I hope it holds unless of course unless I land one bigger
Nice Work Dan!
Its in the bag for you buddy !!!!!...tommorw night you will be a very happy guy...cheers bud
....Bloody awesome.

Hope its you tomorrow cousin if there is one guy who deserves it is you.  I wish your Dad was around he would be so proud,I miss him so much.  Only thing that bugs me is there may be one less tiller boat on the water soon  Mike
